thread.title: Tired and very old, rooms need a refurb
thread.title_full: Tired and very old, rooms need a refurb - Review of Hotel Chandler, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: VTK8
title: Tired and very old, rooms need a refurb
text:
I think this place has not had a refurb in 20+ years. I found the rooms to be musty, dated, dusty and aged, especially all that wood, the bedhead - that seems to have never been dusted, the wooden robes and table. Old old old TV's like 20 years! Bathroom was ok, reasonably clean. Not sure why this hotel has small boutique hotel award anything, I was not impressed by the rooms. The doors are so old and heavy and as a result loud when your neighbours show up at all hours. Despite the convenient and excellent location, would not return here.
Room Tip: There is a construction going on directly next door, a new condominium See more room tips
